title: ARAM acting strange
body: So I've played a couple of games in ARAM recently and each time I've had graves (although that might be a coincidence) but both times the enemy team have been acting like bots in that they all play really really  badly and also don't speak, and my team are only slightly better and none of them speak at all either also i know i didn't accidentally click co op cus all the players have different names its just really weird has anyone else been experiencing this

replies.body: Yeah its a problem, nothing worse than getting a game where theres 0 communication thanks to em lol
This has been an issue for some time now, they are botting to farm ip and or level up.

To address the issue of bots like players, they probably are bots. In pre-30 VS AI and ARAM you get lots of bots because people use them to level accounts for sale. I'd suggest reporting them for suspected bot use.
As for getting Graves twice in a row, that can happen with probability and is more likely the less champs you have. I remember one time I got Maokai 3 ARAMs in a row.
it just seems strange that in both games everyone of them was playing like bots i highly doubt theyd all be doing it
Actually, I wouldn't be surprised if they all were. There are a significant amount of 'bot accounts' in pre-30 games, it's not that uncommon to get a game where most the players are using bots.
